messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] No Disservice
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/3/2004 8:26:20 PM Eastern Daylight Time, dezigna@comcast.net writes: There  have been a couple of times on my local list that I have
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/3/2004 8:26:20 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
dezigna@... writes:

There have been a couple of times on my local list that I have accidentally
written a reply that would be fine on this list - because I have not checked
the subject line carefully enough.
<<<<<
That's happened to me too! I'm thinking, "What in the WORLD??" and then
write this *very* unschooly comeback.
It's happened enough that I always check which list before I hit send! <G>

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
